entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
